summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3834 for the improvement of the alley in blocks 40 and 41, Supplemental Plat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between Bellevue Avenue North and Summit Avenue North, from East Harrison Street to East Mercer Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47067, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
